> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24604?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [25c1c38...776aa90](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24604?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

Had to update a few places using this.

One in resample. We were using this for PI/TDI/DTI to change the freq. It only worked since the object was empty.

The others were tests using the `_shallow_copy` API. Those have been updated to use `asfreq` for PI.
